title: adidas Group - revenue from H1 2017 to H1 2019 , by region
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 3 different Halfs for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the highest SOME LABEL in Half 1st half 2019 and Russia/CIS had the lowest SOME LABEL in Half 1st half 2018.
In Half 1st half 2017, Latin America had the highest SOME LABEL among all 3 Halfs and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Half 1st half 2019.
There is a gap of 116.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Latin America in Half 1st half 2017 and 1st half 2019.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 3 different Halfs for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS that are presented on the X-axis.
In Half 1st half 2019, Asia-Pacific had the highest SOME LABEL 4011.0 among the 6 groups and in 1st half 2018, Russia/CIS had the lowest SOME LABEL 297.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 3 different Halfs for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the highest SOME LABEL in Half 1st half 2019 and Russia/CIS had the lowest SOME LABEL in Half 1st half 2018.
In Half 1st half 2017, Latin America had the highest SOME LABEL among all 3 Halfs and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Half 1st half 2019.
There is a gap of 116.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Latin America in Half 1st half 2017 and 1st half 2019.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 3 different Halfs for 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the highest SOME LABEL in Half 1st half 2019 and Russia/CIS had the lowest SOME LABEL in Half 1st half 2018.
In Half 1st half 2017, Latin America had the highest SOME LABEL among all 3 Halfs and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Half 1st half 2019.
There is a gap of 116.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Latin America in Half 1st half 2017 and 1st half 2019.
Among all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the gap of 771.0 between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL observed in Half 1st half 2019 and 1st half 2017 respectively.

In Half 1st half 2019, Asia-Pacific had the highest SOME LABEL 4011.0 among the 6 groups and in 1st half 2018, Russia/CIS had the lowest SOME LABEL 297.0. The second highest SOME LABEL 644.0 was observed for Asia-Pacific in Half 1st half 2019.

On average, the Half 1st half 2019 had the highest SOME LABEL for all 6 groups Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America, Latin America, Emerging Markets, and Russia/CIS. Whereas 1st half 2017 had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
